query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assessmentId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as null_assessment,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assessmentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_assessment,
  SUM(estimatedCost) as total_cost
FROM deficiencies;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assessmentId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as null_assessment,
  SUM(CASE WHEN assessmentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_assessment,
  SUM(estimatedCost) as total_cost
FROM deficiencies;
